definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go, or come, out, forth (Targum id., NH [[נׇפַק]], Syr. npa4, so Chr-Pal. Schulth:Lex. 126, OAram. Nab. Palm. [[נפק]] Lzb:324, cf. Ar. na0fiqa0’u hole of field mouse; v. also Aram. [[נַפְקוּתָא]], npaqto0 outlay, Eg. Aram. [[נפקתה]] Cooke:Inscr. 212, Ar. nafaqah;un household outlay (Aram. loan-word Schwally:ZMG iii (1898). 133));—

definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[נ]]: Da 2:14 he went out, c. inf.; 3 fs. [[נֶפְקַת]] v:Da 2:13 decree went forth (cf. Lu 2:1); 3 mpl. [[נפְקַו]] Da 5:5 Kt (Qr 3 fpl. [[נְפַ֫קָה]], K:§ 23, 2) fingers came forth; c. [[מִן]] loc.: Imv. mpl. [[פֻּקוּ]] (K:§ 42) Da 3:26 come forth! Pt. pl. [[נָֽפְקִין]] v:Da 3:26 (both of men); sg. [[נׇפֵק]] Da 7:10 (= flow out).

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: bring forth, acc. rei + [[מִן]] loc.: Pf. 3 ms. [[הַנְפֵּק]] Ezr 5:14, Ezr 5:14, Ezr 6:5, Da 5:2; 3 mpl. [[הַנְפִּ֫קוּ]] v:Da 5:3 (so Eg. Aram. S-C:Pap. D 15, 17+).
